contentList.content: Your <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

At the beginning of the wearer's turn, the robe activates, granting them <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to their Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
